containerOverrides.name: api
command: const {Client}=require('pg'); const host=process.env.DB_HOST; const port=Number(process.env.DB_PORT||'5432'); const user=process.env.DB_USER; const password=process.env.DB_PASSWORD; (async()=>{ const c=new Client({host,port,user,password,database:'postgres',ssl:{rejectUnauthorized:false}}); await c.connect(); await c.query('ALTER DATABASE mecove OWNER TO "'+user+'"'); await c.query('GRANT CONNECT ON DATABASE mecove TO "'+user+'"'); await c.query('GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE mecove TO "'+user+'"'); await c.end(); console.log('DB grants OK'); })().catch(e=>{ console.error(e); process.exit(1); });
